@plantingtheoar @AilidhNoor @IrishCoastGuard It says they got another man to help pull them all back out, while they were ringing 911 from the beach. One of the two was swept out again and then they were all thrown forward onto the beach and struggled out with the fourth man helping. Happened in Brittany.

@zoederrick @IrishCoastGuard The second time I watched it, I thought they went onto the beach because they saw him walking around and thought they'd join him. They followed him. Frightening power in that water.
@jim_knipe @IrishCoastGuard Disabled person on the beach, happened to be filming, it's on YouTube. They shouted a warning to the three before the wave came in.
@orchidsbudget @JanetOS_ I don't even know what the legal situation is regarding surrogates. Read about it in England. Not here. Curious, that. However, surrogacy abroad seems to be a voluntary act.
